thread.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens Comic Con reel | JJ Abrams, Episode IX |
thread.title_full: Star Wars: The Force Awakens Comic Con reel | JJ Abrams, Episode IX | The Advertiser

author: STAFF WRITERS
title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens Comic Con reel | JJ Abrams, Episode IX |
text:
THE new Star Wars movie isn’t due out until December, but Christmas came early for diehard fans today with the release of some behind the scenes footage.
The three-and-a-half minute video, which debuted at Comic-Con in San Diego, revealed the new TIE fighter and featured interviews with some of the cast.
Star Wars: Behind the scenes (Frame content direct link: http://media.news.com.au/multimedia/shared/content/nnd-iframes/id1436585071895.html .)
As exciting as the footage was though, it was a surprise appearance by Harrison Ford at the event which stole the show.
The actor who plays Han Solo joined other Star Wars veterans Mark Hamill and Carrie Fisher on the panel to chat about the upcoming film, Star Wars: Episode VII — The Force Awakens .
It was Ford’s first public appearance since his being involved in a plane crash back in March.
Carrie Fisher, from left, Mark Hamill, and Harrison Ford attend the panel. Source: AP
Originally published as New footage: Behind the scenes of Star Wars
